File processing¶

Cryptography¶

Cryptography-related functions required for the Data Delivery System

class ECDHKey(keys=())¶

Bases: object

Elliptic-Curve Diffie-Hellman key pair

private¶

Private component

public¶

Public component, generated from private

del_priv_key()¶

Deletes private key

generate_encryption_key()¶

Derives shared data encryption key

public_to_hex()¶

Converts public key to hex-string

del_priv_key()¶

Sets private key to None - important that it’s kept secret

generate_encryption_key(peer_public: bytes, salt_: str = '') -> (<class 'bytes'>, <class 'bytes'>)¶

Generate shared symmetric encryption key using peer public key and own public and private key

Parameters

  • peer_public (bytes) – Public component of peer ECDH key pair

  • salt (str) – Salt used for deriving shared key. ‘’ if ‘put’ (default)

Returns

Derived key and salt

bool: Derived shared key bool: Salt

Return type

tuple

public_to_hex() → str¶

Converts public key to hex-string

Returns

Hex representation of public key

Return type

str

get_project_private(proj_id: str, user)¶

Gets the project private key from the database - only while downloading.

————————-Format in database:——————————- len(magic) + magic + len(projID) + projID + len(privateKey) + privateKey —————————————————————————

Parameters

  • proj_id (str) – Project ID

  • user (_DSUser) – User object with info on username, password, etc

Returns

Private key belonging to current project

Return type

bytes

File handling¶

File handler. Responsible for IO related operations, including compression, encryption, etc.

aead_decrypt_chacha(file, key: bytes, iv: bytes) -> (<class 'bytes'>, <class 'bytes'>)¶

Decrypts the file in chunks using the IETF ratified ChaCha20-Poly1305 construction described in RFC7539.

Parameters

  • file – Filehandler to read from

  • key (bytes) – Derived, shared key

  • iv (bytes) – First used for encryption/decryption

Yields

tuple –

Nonce and plaintext

bytes: Nonce used for each chunk bytes: Plaintext chunk

Raises

DeliverySystemException – Failed reading of nonces

aead_encrypt_chacha(gen, key: bytes, iv: bytes) -> (<class 'bytes'>, <class 'bytes'>)¶

Encrypts the file in chunks using the IETF ratified ChaCha20-Poly1305 construction described in RFC7539.

Parameters

  • gen (Generator) – Generator object, stream of file chunks

  • key (bytes) – Data encryption key

  • iv (bytes) – Initial nonce

Yields

tuple –

The nonce for each data chunk and ciphertext

bytes: Nonce – number only used once bytes: Ciphertext

check_last_nonce(filename: str, last_nonce: bytes, nonce: bytes) -> (<class 'bool'>, <class 'str'>)¶

Check if the nonces match and give error if they don’t.

Parameters

  • filename (str) – File name

  • last_nonce (bytes) – Last nonce (read from end of encrypted file)

  • nonce (bytes) – Nonce which decryption/decompression ended on

Returns

Info on delivery ok or not

bool: True if the nonces match str: Error message, “” if none

Return type

tuple

compress_file(filehandler, chunk_size: int = 65536) → bytes¶

Compresses file

Parameters

  • file – Path to file

  • chunk_size – Number of bytes to compress at a time

Yields

bytes – Compressed data chunk

decompress_file(filehandler, gen, last_nonce: bytes) -> (<class 'bool'>, <class 'str'>)¶

Decompresses file

Parameters

  • filehandler – Filehandler to save decompressed chunks to/with

  • gen – Generator - all decrypted chunks streamed

  • last_nonce (bytes) – Last nonce found from file

Returns

Info on saved file, decryption and decompression

bool: True if file saved and last nonce is correct str: Error message, “” if none

Return type

tuple

file_deleter(file: pathlib.Path)¶

Delete file

Parameters

file (Path) – Path to file

file_reader(filehandler, chunk_size: int = 65536) → bytes¶

Yields the file chunk by chunk.

Parameters

  • file – Path to file

  • chunk_size – Number of bytes to read from file at a time

Yields

bytes – Data chunk of size chunk_size

file_writer(filehandler, gen, last_nonce)¶

Writes decrypted chunks to file. Checks if last nonces match.

Parameters

  • filehandler – Filehandler to save decompressed chunks to/with

  • gen – Generator - all decrypted chunks streamed

  • last_nonce (bytes) – Last nonce found from file

Returns

Info on saved file, decryption and decompression

bool: True if file saved and last nonce is correct str: Error message, “” if none

Return type

tuple

get_root_path(file: pathlib.Path, path_base: str = None) → pathlib.Path¶

Gets the path to the file, from the entered folder.

Parameters

  • file – Path to file

  • path_base – None if single file, folder name if in folder

Returns

Path from folder to file

Return type

Path

is_compressed(file: pathlib.Path) -> (<class 'bool'>, <class 'str'>)¶

Checks for file signatures in common compression formats.

Parameters

file (Path) – Path object to be checked.

Returns

Info on if compressed format or not.

bool: True if file is compressed format. str: Error message, “” if no error

Return type

tuple

process_file(file: pathlib.Path, file_info: dict, peer_public) -> (<class 'bool'>, <class 'pathlib.Path'>, <class 'int'>, <class 'bool'>, <class 'bytes'>, <class 'bytes'>, <class 'str'>)¶

Processes the files incl compression, encryption

Parameters

  • file (Path) – Path to file

  • file_info (dict) – Info about file

Returns

Information about finished processing

bool: True if processing successful Path: Path to processed file int: Size of processed file bool: True if file compressed by the delivery system bytes: Public key needed for file decryption bytes: Salt needed for shared key derivation str: Error message, ‘’ if none

Return type

tuple

Raises

  • DeliverySystemException – Failed processing or wrong argument format

  • OSError – File not found or could not create tempdir

reverse_processing(file: str, file_info: dict, keys: tuple) -> (<class 'bool'>, <class 'str'>, <class 'str'>)¶

Decrypts and decompresses file (if DS compressed)

Parameters

  • file (str) – Path to file

  • file_info (dict) – Info on file

  • keys (tuple) – Project specific ECDH keys required for decryption Format: (public, private)

Returns

Info on finalizing delivery

bool: True if decryption etc successful str: Decrypted file str: Error message, “” if none

Return type

tuple
